Hi all. I hope this is the right place to ask. Otherwise, please feel free to re-direct me! :slightly_smiling_face:

I am encountering an issue with the minimal MLK non-working example below:

`using Flux`
`using Symbolics`
`using DiffEqFlux`
`using ModelingToolkit`
`using NeuralPDE`
`using GalacticOptim`

`@parameters t, l, r`
`TMAX = 1000.0`
`LMAX = 300.0`
`RMAX = 10.0`

`Dt  = Differential(t)`
`Dl  = Differential(l)`
`Dr  = Differential(r)`

`@variables u1(..), u2(..)`

`domains = [`
    `t in ModelingToolkit.IntervalDomain(0.0,TMAX),`
    `l in ModelingToolkit.IntervalDomain(0.0,LMAX),`
    `r in ModelingToolkit.IntervalDomain(0.0,RMAX), ]`
`steps = [ 10,10,10 ]` 
`dxs = [`
    `(domains[i].domain.upper-domains[i].domain.lower)/steps[i]`
    `for i in 1:length(domains) ]`
`indvars = [t,l,r]`
`depvars = [u1,u2]`

`inner = 30`
`chains = [`
    `FastChain(`
        `FastDense(length(indvars),inner,Flux.σ),`
        `FastDense(inner,inner,Flux.σ),`
        `FastDense(inner,inner,Flux.σ),`
        `FastDense(inner,1))`
    `for u in depvars]`
`strategy = GridTraining(dxs)`
`discretization = PhysicsInformedNN(chains, strategy)`

`I(t) = (t<=TMAX/2) ? -1.0 : 1.0`
`ModelingToolkit.@register I(t)`

`eqs = [`
    `Dl(u1(t,l,r)) ~ 0.f0,`
    `Dr(u1(t,l,r)) ~ 0.f0,`
    `Dt(u2(t,l,r)) ~ 0.f0,`
    `Dl(u2(t,l,r)) ~ 0.f0,`
    `Dr(u2(t,l,r)) ~ 0.f0, ]`
`bcs = [`
    `u1(t,0,0) ~ I(t),`
    `u2(0,0,r) ~ 2.f0, ]`

`max_iterations = 3`
`pde_system = PDESystem(eqs,bcs,domains,indvars,depvars)`
`prob = discretize(pde_system,discretization)`

which produces an

`ERROR: LoadError: BoundsError: attempt to access 0-element Vector{Vector{Any}} at index [1]` 

in NeuralPDE/`pinns_pde_solve.jl` :get_argument() while returning the `first.(args_)` , that I think depends on the fact that `e isa Expr` is False in `find_thing_in_expr()`  for the `eqs` above.

Any suggestions? :-D
